data.news_body:

1. Appointment of Mr. Sarat Kumar Asuri CFO as the Chief Investor Relations Officer.

2. Change in remuneration of the Whole Time Director Mr. Mohan Muthunarayanan.

4. Review and confirmation of Risk Management Policy.
